translations: 智力，思维能力；才智出众者

sentences.sentence: She was one of the most formidable intellects of her time.
sentences.translation: 她是当时的一名盖世英才。

sentences.sentence: Einstein was one of the greatest intellects of his time.
sentences.translation: 爱因斯坦是他的时代里最有才智的人之一。

sentences.sentence: They want you to believe that Science is driven by superior intellects.
sentences.translation: 他们总是想让你相信科学其实是由超级学者推动的。
